-- calculate new scale local newXScale = editor.oldScale * (cursorX/uiScale - editor.oldX*editor.oldScale) / (self.oldCursorX/uiScale - editor.oldX*editor.oldScale) local newYScale = editor.oldScale * (cursorY/uiScale - editor.oldY*editor.oldScale) / (self.oldCursorY/uiScale - editor.oldY*editor.oldScale) local newScale = min(2, max(0.4, newXScale, newYScale)) editor:SetScale(newScale)
-- calculate new frame position local newX = editor.oldX * editor.oldScale / newScale local newY = editor.oldY * editor.oldScale / newScale editor:ClearAllPoints() editor:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", UIParent, "BOTTOMLEFT", newX, newY) end)
